messages.messageBody:
<<We have that. We killed two animals with it.>>

We've had this kind of problem with Harvest Moon. Lanora loves it
because she is old enough to remember to feed the animals everyday.
Jonathan hasn't grasped that concept yet so his animals always die,
naturally this is upsetting. I've tried explaining that this is why I,
an adult, makes sure that all of our "real" animals get fed and watered
everyday, because it can be hard for younger people to remember. He
seems to feel a little better but not completely over the sadness.

Kris
